7d2542ae-814b-4879-b6c0-e756cda98144.content: {Virtue is a form of moral excellence}, {Moral excellence involves aligning with rational moral standards}, {Rational moral standards entail critical examination and revision over time}

61035791-d514-40f6-839e-7e6fd6567ecd.summary: Distinguishing between ideal and actual moral standards
61035791-d514-40f6-839e-7e6fd6567ecd.content: {There is a distinction between ideal moral standards and actual social moral standards}, {Virtue as moral excellence is concerned with ideal moral standards determined by timeless rational principles}, {Historical instances of flawed standards are cases of deviation from the ideal standards}, {Such deviations do not undermine the concept of virtue as moral excellence when aligned with ideal rational principles}

b0f0f0fb-b03e-474c-b953-211951ed5eff.summary: Rejecting the infallibility of historical rational principles
b0f0f0fb-b03e-474c-b953-211951ed5eff.content: {It is false that all rational principles historically accepted are infallible}, {Moral excellence requires adherence to perfect or ideal rational principles, not past rationalizations}, {Recognizing that some accepted rational principles were flawed does not imply that moral standards determined by correct rational principles are flawed}, {Virtue as moral excellence involves constantly refining rational principles towards perfection}

91934757-80b1-4781-bb96-65b6191d1a27.content: {Assume that human moral understanding progresses over time}, {Errors in historical moral standards are due to limited understanding of rational principles at the time}, {Virtue as moral excellence includes improving moral standards as understanding of rational principles evolves}, {This progress addresses past flaws without undermining the concept of virtue determined by current rational principles}

abe3244c-4b0c-43f8-8e7d-ef339f9687a2.content: {Virtue is fulfilling essential functions of a human being}, {The human functions include rational, emotional, social, and creative activities}, {Virtue involves performing rational activity excellently}, {Virtue involves performing emotional activities excellently}, {Virtue involves performing social activities excellently}, {Virtue involves performing creative activities excellently}

3afb33e8-f9a1-4dde-91f6-48d170ee7b67.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being within specific contexts}, {The human function varies with situational demands}, {Virtue involves rational activity when it is contextually demanded}, {Virtue involves emotional activity when it is contextually demanded}, {Virtue involves social activity when it is contextually demanded}, {Virtue involves creative activity when it is contextually demanded}

fb371d51-2a43-41aa-9f00-ee9230282bef.content: {Virtue is fulfilling integrated functions of a human being}, {The human function is a holistic integration of rational, emotional, social, and creative activities}, {Virtue involves performing this integrated function excellently}

c3b9250f-d526-4f61-ad6a-c1014a48f960.content: {Virtue is fulfilling multiple functions of a human being}, {The human functions include various rational, emotional, and creative facets}, {Virtue demands balance among rational, emotional, social, and creative activities}

08e9c3dd-acc1-4a11-84b2-c8231cb477ee.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the harmonious function of a human being}, {The human function consists of cultivating harmony among rational, emotional, social, and creative activities}, {Virtue involves achieving balance and harmony among these activities}

39e45030-e181-4ddf-be62-77a6b6caf11e.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the dynamic function of a human being}, {The human function includes adapting to changing individual and societal needs}, {Virtue involves the flexible excellence of rational, emotional, social, and creative activities}

9c244e16-1bba-481f-8a6b-67e82a25ebb1.content: {There is a distinction between primary and secondary human functions.}, {Rational activity is the primary function of human beings, but not their only essential function.}, {Other activities like emotional and social interactions serve as secondary functions.}, {Virtue involves excelling in the primary function of rational activity while also integrating secondary functions.}

75bfcef2-3a76-4a4a-99ae-1e8deea07e5b.summary: Rational activity as the basis for integrating other functions
75bfcef2-3a76-4a4a-99ae-1e8deea07e5b.content: {Rational activity provides the basis for effectively integrating all human functions.}, {Emotional, social, and creative activities can be considered as guided or structured by rationality.}, {The virtue of rational activity lies in its ability to harmonize and enhance these other roles.}, {Fulfilling the function of rational activity ensures that other functions are aligned with overall human flourishing.}

990e4abf-4484-43c1-856d-aeb1e011700e.summary: Rejecting the idea that humans have multiple unrelated essential functions
990e4abf-4484-43c1-856d-aeb1e011700e.content: {The notion that human beings have multiple unrelated essential functions is mistaken.}, {Rational activity is the unifying function that encompasses and informs all other human activities.}, {Emotional and social activities are expressions or manifestations of rational activity.}, {This holistic view clarifies that diverse activities are not separate from but rather integrated within the rational function.}

412e7fad-b341-4042-9136-c66b64bb9b19.summary: Supplementary assumption about rational activity as uniquely human
412e7fad-b341-4042-9136-c66b64bb9b19.content: {Rational activity is uniquely characteristic of human beings, setting them apart from other beings.}, {While emotional, social, and creative activities are important, they do not distinguish humans from other species.}, {Virtue in the context of the human function requires emphasizing rational activity as the definitive human capability.}, {Therefore, focusing on rational activity is justified as it captures the uniqueness of the human function.}

1b352155-966e-4165-bb7e-496e1dcdf1fe.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function includes rational and non-rational activities}, {Virtue involves performing both rational and non-rational activities excellently}

505829bf-ee70-406a-ba3f-4be3e5b7ea7c.content: {Virtue is fulfilling multiple functions of a human being}, {Human functions include rational activity, social engagement, and emotional responsiveness}, {Virtue involves performing rational, social, and emotional activities excellently}

1bd6d35d-814e-405d-b5f1-0b4e2dc6f2aa.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the balanced function of a human being}, {The human function involves a balance of rational and emotional activities}, {Virtue involves achieving excellence in both rational and emotional activities harmoniously}

ca531c52-60dd-41b8-8224-0b4b1d8c3583.content: {Virtue is fulfilling a holistic function of a human being}, {The human function is a combination of cognitive, emotional, and social elements}, {Virtue involves excelling in cognitive, emotional, and social elements}

698c2ec9-21ce-4ca6-aed3-cb2fdf5eb973.content: {Virtue is fulfilling an integrated function of a human being}, {The human function involves integration of rational, emotional, and ethical activities}, {Virtue involves performing integrated rational, emotional, and ethical activities excellently}

5702a842-cdac-4b48-9d6f-a7efd911ad0e.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the pluralistic function of a human being}, {The human function encompasses a plurality of activities beyond rationality}, {Virtue involves achieving excellence across this plurality of activities}

1acfb8ed-1829-4b64-9659-08afc5ec8343.content: {Virtue involves achieving excellence in all fundamental human activities}, {Human activities include rational, emotional, and social processes}, {Excellence in these activities defines comprehensive human virtue}

f9d7848d-fc20-460d-a761-9c8827b2c7c1.content: {There is a distinction between virtues that are primarily rational and those that are not}, {Virtue as function fulfillment is a theory about rational virtues rather than non-rational virtues}, {Non-rational virtues can be understood as complements to rational virtues rather than as opposed or marginalized}, {The intuition that non-rational virtues are excluded can be explained by conflating them with the rational-centric view of virtue}

d4e56d04-b25b-4106-b8b9-9401a40c5e4a.content: {The concept of rational activity can be expanded to include emotional intelligence and empathetic understanding}, {Virtue as performing rational activity excellently can encompass traditionally non-rational virtues if these virtues contribute to excellence in rational activity}, {Compassion and empathy can be redefined as integral forms of rational activity because they involve understanding and responding appropriately to emotions}

c1e1d66b-3abb-419c-9857-84fd6ecb2620.summary: Supplementary assumption of holistic human function
c1e1d66b-3abb-419c-9857-84fd6ecb2620.content: {A holistic view of human function includes both rational and emotional dimensions}, {Virtue involves fulfilling human function in both rational and emotional domains}, {With this assumption, virtues like compassion and empathy are seen as fulfilling the emotional aspect of human function}, {Virtue as function fulfillment can thus accommodate non-rational virtues through a holistic understanding of human function}

e33ac121-d92b-44ad-8b1f-d7bb527b7c0e.summary: Partial rejection of the objection's focus on exclusion
e33ac121-d92b-44ad-8b1f-d7bb527b7c0e.content: {The claim that a focus on rational activity would exclude non-rational virtues is mistaken}, {Non-rational virtues can be understood as embedded in contexts where rational decision-making and understanding are crucial}, {The objection inaccurately assumes that rational activity and non-rational virtues are mutually exclusive aspects of virtue}

c52dfa36-542a-4647-a4de-f6b8d8352f7a.summary: Virtue as Rational and Emotional Fulfillment
c52dfa36-542a-4647-a4de-f6b8d8352f7a.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is rational and emotional activity}, {Virtue involves performing rational and emotional activity excellently}

b7b2b0f4-4555-41c5-8260-3a7d36732007.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function includes rational, moral, and emotional dimensions}, {Virtue involves performing rational, moral, and emotional activities excellently}

098f0ffe-69e9-4f4e-8a9c-b8c6e7b8e75f.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function involves integration of rational, emotional, and social activities}, {Virtue involves excellence in rational, emotional, and social activities}

533ef3a1-5d19-48dc-b28d-2c0edbea93af.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is the integration of rational, emotional, and moral activities}, {Virtue involves excellent performance in integrated rational, emotional, and moral activities}

136acbee-5842-4e2b-8744-2be61ce10fed.summary: Distinguishing Rational Activity from Holistic Fulfillment
136acbee-5842-4e2b-8744-2be61ce10fed.content: {There is a distinction between rational activity and holistic human fulfillment.}, {Virtue as function fulfillment is primarily concerned with rational activity, not the entirety of human fulfillment.}, {Excellence in rational activity does not imply immediate or complete excellence in all areas of life.}, {The objection confuses the focus on rational activity with a broader claim about holistic human fulfillment.}

570713fe-4b80-48d7-80e1-6c57c8af9c55.summary: Rejecting the Necessity of Moral and Emotional Excellence for Function Fulfillment
570713fe-4b80-48d7-80e1-6c57c8af9c55.content: {Excellence in rational activity is sufficient for fulfilling the essential function of being human.}, {The objection incorrectly assumes that moral and emotional dimensions are necessary for the fulfillment of the human function.}, {Fulfillment of the human function is mainly about rational excellence, which can be present independently of other excellences.}

637a57b1-2c6a-46b3-b0fd-c625ef80ac70.summary: Supplementing with the Role of Rational Guidance
637a57b1-2c6a-46b3-b0fd-c625ef80ac70.content: {Rational activity includes guiding moral and emotional aspects through reason.}, {The role of rationality is not just participation but also to guide and shape other dimensions of life.}, {By assuming the guiding role, rational activity contributes to excellence in other areas essential for human fulfillment.}

0b7940b0-dce9-402d-9702-53f8f352c1d1.content: {Virtue is contextual}, {Virtue involves performing rational activity excellently in alignment with cultural norms}, {The human function is rational activity within varying cultural contexts}

a937fd24-2079-46a9-aaa4-4f96229caf5b.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the human function dynamically}, {The human function is adaptable rational activity}, {Virtue involves performing rational activity excellently in response to changing circumstances}

f36b18f8-4168-4da4-a0f2-835157ae35a1.content: {Virtue is culturally defined rational flourishing}, {The human function is culturally influenced rational activity}, {Virtue involves performing rational activity excellently in accordance with cultural flourishing}

f6196b19-85b5-4fbe-b102-1236651af68a.content: {Virtue evolves with the rational purpose of humans}, {The human function is achieving rational purposes defined by historical context}, {Virtue involves the excellent fulfillment of these evolving rational purposes}

891108ba-9c55-4efa-8f3e-5b9be7a95757.content: {Virtue encompasses a plurality of rational activities}, {The human function involves multiple rational activities relevant to differing social contexts}, {Virtue involves performing these diverse rational activities excellently}

6401391d-2358-45e1-acc5-7ecb482e53e0.summary: Distinguishing between basic and applied virtues
6401391d-2358-45e1-acc5-7ecb482e53e0.content: {There is a distinction between basic virtues, which are fixed, and applied virtues, which vary with context}, {Basic virtues are tied to the stable human function of rational activity}, {Applied virtues are how basic virtues manifest in specific historical and cultural contexts}, {The variability of virtues is due to the changing conditions under which rational activity is excellently performed}

a9b42371-bab9-4fc1-beda-4523e1b05e4c.content: {Rational activity is sensitive to historical and cultural contexts}, {Fulfilling the human function involves adapting rational activity to specific social and cultural settings}, {Virtues reflect the adaptability required to perform rational activity excellently in varying contexts}, {The variability of virtues demonstrates the flexibility of rational activity rather than a contradiction}

51743ac6-a267-4817-96e9-4ede000a3012.summary: Virtue remains fixed amid social variability
51743ac6-a267-4817-96e9-4ede000a3012.content: {The function of a human remains stable even if the expressions of virtue vary}, {Virtue as fulfillment of function refers to an underlying, constant standard of excellence}, {Different historical and cultural settings can demand different practices, but the core function of rational activity remains}, {Social adaptations are the surface variations of a stable human function}

c237cff2-7ffb-473e-9de8-61e5513ce0bf.content: {Human functions have evolved with social and environmental changes}, {Fulfilling the function of a human means aligning with both biological and cultural evolution}, {Virtue as fulfilling human function incorporates the evolutionary aspects of rational activity}, {Historical and cultural variability of virtue aligns with natural human adaptability over time}

f8f04f80-089a-493f-847b-88e9fa1b54f1.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function involves both rational activity and emotional intelligence}, {Virtue involves performing rational activity excellently}, {Virtue involves integrating emotional intelligence with rational activity}

23d6eb4f-353c-4c53-b38f-c372bd0aad7b.summary: Virtue as Rational and Affective Excellence
23d6eb4f-353c-4c53-b38f-c372bd0aad7b.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is rational and affective activity}, {Virtue involves performing rational activity excellently}, {Virtue involves performing affective activity excellently}

84130b11-2f11-40e1-a1d4-b8e8e691c3be.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is the holistic use of rational, emotional, and volitional faculties}, {Virtue involves performing rational activity excellently}, {Virtue involves performing emotional activity excellently}, {Virtue involves performing volitional activity excellently}

311b4019-e157-4ae7-8e16-ecf3f31a7418.summary: Virtue as Rational and Emotional Harmony
311b4019-e157-4ae7-8e16-ecf3f31a7418.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is the harmonious integration of rational and emotional processes}, {Virtue involves achieving harmony between rational and emotional faculties}

6f6e8043-2f3d-441b-a847-1da589b211dc.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function encompasses intellectual, emotional, and moral dimensions}, {Virtue involves performing intellectual activity excellently}, {Virtue involves performing emotional activity excellently}, {Virtue involves performing moral activity excellently}

533cf7d1-fbe2-4127-a4d1-ed7b3de4476f.content: {There is a distinction between rational activity and intellectualism}, {Virtue involves rational activity, which includes, but is not limited to, intellectual processes}, {Rational activity as part of virtue encompasses emotional intelligence}, {Emotions can be informed by rationality without reducing them to purely intellectual exercises}, {The intuition that rational activity excludes emotion stems from a misunderstanding of how rationality can engage with emotions}

a148abe4-e610-470d-9734-c124f44ec050.summary: Rejecting the notion that virtue excludes emotion
a148abe4-e610-470d-9734-c124f44ec050.content: {It is false that virtue as rational activity excludes emotion}, {In fulfilling the function of rational activity, human beings integrate rational thought with emotional responses}, {Many virtues require the harmonious interplay of reason and emotion}, {The account of virtue as rational activity includes emotional intelligence as part of rational excellence}

1e31fad0-c335-4fb0-80d8-4ebaef71e651.summary: Supplementing rational activity with emotional virtues
1e31fad0-c335-4fb0-80d8-4ebaef71e651.content: {Virtue as function fulfillment involves both rational and emotional faculties}, {Rational activity in virtue necessarily includes emotional understanding and intelligence}, {The concept of rational activity can be supplemented with the role of emotions to fully address human function}, {Emotional virtues are integral to fulfilling the human function as described by rational activity when seen holistically}

98637be5-dcfc-48af-a159-d9811fc8f7d6.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function includes both rational and non-rational activities}, {Virtue involves performing both rational and non-rational activities excellently}

2239347c-625a-4f60-bfee-e7b8d42bbac0.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the holistic function of a human being}, {The human holistic function encompasses rational, emotional, and physical activities}, {Virtue involves excelling in rational, emotional, and physical activities}

cd7c60ab-3762-473e-91ad-a6f69e056c00.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the adaptable function of a human being}, {The human function is the ability to adapt to both rational and irrational contexts}, {Virtue involves excelling in being adaptable across diverse contexts}

4d90d277-ea4a-44c3-96c2-ecdbe5cda51c.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the context-dependent function of a human being}, {The human function varies across different contexts and can include non-rational elements}, {Virtue involves performing activities excellently within their specific context}

9dba90aa-da09-470a-ab1a-fac4c5a07286.content: {Virtue is contributing to the flourishing of a human being}, {Human flourishing involves a balance of rational and non-rational pursuits}, {Virtue involves excelling in both rational and non-rational pursuits in balance}

9d4eec8e-766a-4342-b630-dbd1db2549ad.summary: Virtue as Integration of Human Capacities
9d4eec8e-766a-4342-b630-dbd1db2549ad.content: {Virtue is integrating various human capacities for fulfillment}, {Human capacities include rational, emotional, and instinctive elements}, {Virtue involves harmoniously integrating rational, emotional, and instinctive elements for fulfillment}

9741b13e-aa20-4ea7-ae94-8e2f2febf4a9.content: {Virtue is the realization of the full potential of a human being}, {Human potential includes rational, non-rational, and arational elements}, {Virtue involves excelling in realizing rational, non-rational, and arational potential}

ba39ee72-6990-4c97-a92a-049794cb193e.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the multi-dimensional function of a human being}, {The human function involves multiple dimensions including rational and creative activities}, {Virtue involves performing with excellence across multiple dimensions}

95d44eae-a07b-41e3-a2b2-0dbba1f0db57.content: {Virtue is dynamically fulfilling human functions}, {Human functions dynamically encompass rational, arational, and nonexistent norms}, {Virtue involves excelling in dynamically fulfilling these functions}

cf264b0d-99c3-4d9e-a36c-005d0d56bc85.content: {Virtue is about balancing the various functions of a human being}, {The human function demands balancing rationality with irrational tendencies}, {Virtue involves excelling in maintaining this balance}

63b02ab3-9cc1-4c69-b716-b17888da60f1.summary: Distinguishing between rational and instrumental rational activities
63b02ab3-9cc1-4c69-b716-b17888da60f1.content: {There is a distinction between rational activities that are directly rational and those that only instrumentally use rationality}, {Some activities may seem arational but can still be supported by rational planning or reflection}, {Virtues arising in seemingly arational activities can be understood as those supported by instrumental rationality}

e17c7399-4b83-4d35-a9a6-e27d05f74377.summary: Rejecting the claim that virtues require direct rational activity
e17c7399-4b83-4d35-a9a6-e27d05f74377.content: {It is mistaken to assume that virtues must arise purely from direct rational activity}, {Virtues like spontaneity or creativity can arise in contexts where rationality provides a background or indirect framework}, {The lack of overt rational control does not preclude rational activity from underlying virtues indirectly}

92c8393f-49ec-4032-8b90-40b6c6fd00af.summary: Introducing an assumption about rational capacity being sufficient
92c8393f-49ec-4032-8b90-40b6c6fd00af.content: {Assume that having the capacity for rationality is sufficient for virtue manifestation even in arational activities}, {Virtues may emerge in contexts where rational capacity influences but does not dominate the activity}, {Rational capacity shaped by experience might promulgate virtues without constantly manifesting overt rational acts}

d6e81e21-621e-4365-bc43-daf98a0ce09a.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is rational activity}, {Virtue involves performing rational activity guided by practical wisdom}, {Practical wisdom ensures that rational activity aligns with moral behavior}

5e8783a7-b3f1-4d09-832f-de382311351c.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is rational activity}, {Virtue involves performing rational activity that is consistent with a virtuous character}, {A virtuous character naturally aligns rationality with morality}

66b45b33-41f8-4e77-92a1-f598baf23abd.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is rational activity}, {Virtue involves rational activity informed by moral emotions}, {Moral emotions help in discerning the moral dimension of rational actions}

d3ff2802-8d7c-4aba-b4e7-a5de379a6bb7.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is rational activity}, {Virtue involves a synthesis of rational activity and moral understanding}, {Moral understanding integrates moral principles with rational thought}

a7ec248c-23a8-40b9-9497-cb90df3db3bc.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is rational activity}, {Virtue involves rational activity that is sensitive to moral contexts}, {Sensitivity to moral contexts helps guide rational actions towards moral outcomes}

a4c1b845-0326-4577-9c7f-4f5e3d50aac5.summary: Distinguishing between types of rational activity
a4c1b845-0326-4577-9c7f-4f5e3d50aac5.content: {There is a distinction between rational activity that is morally oriented and rational activity that is purely instrumental}, {Virtue involves performing morally oriented rational activity excellently, not just any type of rational activity}, {The objection conflates purely instrumental rationality with morally oriented rationality, leading to the mistaken conclusion that rational activity is not always moral}

5f5fc763-39ee-4158-ba07-9bcbf3c77dda.summary: Rejecting the intuition that rational excellence is morally neutral
5f5fc763-39ee-4158-ba07-9bcbf3c77dda.content: {It is mistaken to assume that rational excellence permits morally questionable actions}, {Rational excellence in the context of virtue presupposes alignment with moral principles}, {Highly rational but morally questionable actions are not examples of virtue, as they disregard the intrinsic connection between rational excellence and morality}

4755940d-4db9-476d-a843-434e8a7925bb.summary: Adding a moral dimension to rational activity
4755940d-4db9-476d-a843-434e8a7925bb.content: {Rational activity can encompass both cognitive and moral dimensions when understood as aimed at the good}, {A supplementary assumption is that rational activity directed toward moral ends is part of virtue}, {By incorporating a moral dimension, the theory maintains that genuine rational excellence naturally aligns with moral behavior, addressing the objection}

596789fc-074e-444f-b7d2-61a284383c74.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of promoting human flourishing}, {Human flourishing involves achieving well-being and happiness}, {Virtue involves engaging in activities that promote well-being and happiness excellently}

202b74e6-9536-442f-88a8-892beb2b7f70.summary: Virtue as Excellence in Rational Capacities
202b74e6-9536-442f-88a8-892beb2b7f70.content: {Virtue involves excellence in rational capacities}, {Rational capacities include reasoning, understanding, and practical wisdom}, {Excellence in rational capacities contributes to leading a good life}

2563e6d2-f35d-4ce6-a814-9dcff126ea73.content: {Virtue involves exercising practical wisdom}, {Practical wisdom is the ability to make good decisions about how to live well}, {Making good decisions contributes to living a virtuous life}

493df0bb-f7bd-4c88-9ba1-d19d98403e2f.content: {Virtue involves the development of character traits}, {Character traits include honesty, courage, and compassion}, {Developing positive character traits leads to a good life}

c401b2c3-4eb9-4255-8042-922193c89df2.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of promoting holistic well-being}, {Holistic well-being involves physical, mental, and social health}, {Virtue involves activities that enhance these aspects of well-being}

99899419-eb3c-47ec-a43b-1eb9301bdaf3.content: {Virtue involves participatory engagement with community}, {Participatory engagement involves contributing positively to social contexts}, {Engagement leads to personal and communal well-being}

fcd45483-d664-44bb-ab47-f45177dd7902.summary: Virtue as Alignment with Human Nature
fcd45483-d664-44bb-ab47-f45177dd7902.content: {Virtue aligns with human nature}, {Human nature includes capacities for reason, emotion, and social interaction}, {Aligning actions with these capacities is virtuous}

14a334e1-f263-4480-b442-24d79f979f51.content: {Virtue involves the process of personal growth}, {Personal growth includes developing moral and intellectual skills}, {Moral and intellectual development leads to a fulfilling life}

b0f2e948-022c-4ae8-a9c5-f6fe64d4701a.content: {Virtue involves contextual assessments of goodness}, {Contextual goodness takes into account the specific circumstances of actions}, {Understanding context leads to appropriate virtuous actions}

2c9c1c12-2230-4153-9ae4-83f538410559.summary: Distinguishing between essential and non-essential functions
2c9c1c12-2230-4153-9ae4-83f538410559.content: {There is a distinction between essential and non-essential functions of a human being}, {The concept of virtue as function fulfillment applies only to the essential function of rational activity}, {While humans have various biological and social functions, the essential function related to virtue is rational activity}, {The objection that varied functions undermine the concept of a singular function for virtue misunderstands the focus on essential function}

8b4c5b6b-c66a-4aca-a9cc-cef8ee673426.summary: Rejecting the necessity of a singular function
8b4c5b6b-c66a-4aca-a9cc-cef8ee673426.content: {It is not necessary for there to be a singular function of a human being for the concept of virtue to be valid}, {Virtue involves fulfilling the function that is most fundamental to what it means to be human, which is rational activity}, {The presence of varied and complex functions does not negate the validity of identifying rational activity as the basis for virtue}

b71d1435-6458-4eec-b7ff-94cd1b1f9dd3.summary: Supplementing with a concept of ideal rational capacity
b71d1435-6458-4eec-b7ff-94cd1b1f9dd3.content: {The human function in the context of virtue is seen as an ideal rational capacity, not a definitive single activity}, {Virtue as fulfillment does not depend on identifying a singular function but on realizing the ideal rational capacity}, {Understanding virtue as the development and excellence in rational capacity makes the notion of function fulfillment coherent despite diverse functions}

893a2919-79bc-4853-baa3-6619a2c47096.summary: Rational activity as a unifying function
893a2919-79bc-4853-baa3-6619a2c47096.content: {Rational activity can be understood as a unifying function despite the complexity of human roles}, {The human capacity for rational activity underpins and integrates varied human functions}, {Virtue involves the excellence in rational activity that provides coherence and direction to other human functions}

e1dafec3-0178-4984-ad2b-8c1835baac26.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is rational activity}, {Rational activity is defined in relation to individual contexts and experiences}, {Virtue involves performing rational activity excellently, as defined by context}

dc51ab15-2f96-4c23-83c1-b6586c30f7a8.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is rational activity}, {The nature of rational activity is inherently pluralistic, allowing for various interpretations}, {Virtue involves performing rational activity excellently according to plural standards}

1f1b174a-7831-49af-b2fe-0ec9eb217483.summary: Virtue as Harmonizing Personal Rational Activities
1f1b174a-7831-49af-b2fe-0ec9eb217483.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is rational activity}, {Rational activity includes harmonizing personal and existential differences}, {Virtue involves performing harmonized rational activity excellently}

10d4ea1c-2e6f-4dda-8a32-f7d8700d832c.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is rational activity}, {Rational activity requires adaptation to individual circumstances and existential contexts}, {Virtue involves performing adaptive rational activity excellently}

27d9937d-444e-4a62-9c23-3a740938efae.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is rational activity}, {Excellence in rational activity is defined within the context of individual life circumstances}, {Virtue involves achieving contextually defined excellence in rational activity}

8e84ff24-a355-46a2-bfb4-7a54b2e7385b.summary: Distinguishing between universal and contextual notions of excellence
8e84ff24-a355-46a2-bfb4-7a54b2e7385b.content: {There is a distinction between universal excellence and context-specific excellence.}, {Virtue as function fulfillment is primarily concerned with universal notions of rational activity.}, {Individual differences can be reconciled by acknowledging that context-specific excellence contributes to virtue without contradicting the universal account.}, {The universal criteria provide a guiding framework while allowing for context-specific nuances.}

e02ed80b-0035-4a85-a9d4-d32c8cfee02d.summary: Rejecting the necessity of absolute universality
e02ed80b-0035-4a85-a9d4-d32c8cfee02d.content: {It is not necessary for virtue to be defined in a way that is absolutely universal across all personal contexts.}, {The theoretical view on virtue does not conflict with the existence of personal differences.}, {Rational activity and its excellence can be understood as universal goals despite varying individual experiences.}, {The notion of universality here means communal objectives in rational endeavors rather than rigid uniformity.}

f5f18b7c-0f45-4970-ac04-31814537ed07.summary: Incorporating existential considerations within rational activity
f5f18b7c-0f45-4970-ac04-31814537ed07.content: {Rational activity, as part of human function, inherently includes addressing personal and existential predicaments.}, {A comprehensive understanding of rational excellence involves adaptation to diverse existential conditions.}, {The framework can accommodate individual differences by interpreting rational functions dynamically in relation to personal contexts.}, {Excellence in rational activity includes the consideration of how existential concerns are managed in one's life.}

743084a4-547d-4bee-9d22-698782036cca.summary: Virtue as Excellence in Rationality and Character
743084a4-547d-4bee-9d22-698782036cca.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is rational activity}, {Virtue involves performing rational activity excellently}, {Virtue requires excellence of character and proper intentions}, {Virtue encompasses motivations that align with rational excellence}

f2f33f60-10c5-4e53-af50-8a4740ae6774.summary: Virtue as Integrated Rational Function and Moral Motivation
f2f33f60-10c5-4e53-af50-8a4740ae6774.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is rational activity}, {Virtue involves performing rational activity excellently}, {Virtue includes moral motivations that guide rational actions}, {Excellence in virtue integrates rationality and moral intentions}

0a142489-2b46-4d79-bdf2-180e4bcd5848.summary: Virtue as Rational Fulfillment and Moral Intent
0a142489-2b46-4d79-bdf2-180e4bcd5848.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is rational activity}, {Virtue involves performing rational activity excellently}, {Virtue includes the right moral intent behind actions}, {Excellence in virtue combines rational activity with virtuous intentions}

fbd5c12d-a0bc-4db0-a420-e20b73b9b4aa.summary: Virtue as Holistic Rational and Character Fulfillment
fbd5c12d-a0bc-4db0-a420-e20b73b9b4aa.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is rational activity}, {Virtue involves performing rational activity excellently}, {Virtue incorporates holistic character development}, {Excellence in virtue requires both rational achievement and character integrity}

80710d33-c812-4828-9af1-11a2bbce839f.summary: Virtue as Rational Excellence and Ethical Motivation
80710d33-c812-4828-9af1-11a2bbce839f.content: {Virtue is fulfilling the function of a human being}, {The human function is rational activity}, {Virtue involves performing rational activity excellently}, {Virtue includes acting from ethical motivations}, {Excellence in virtue represents the fusion of rational excellence and ethical purpose}

9042c7e1-f6a9-4e04-8cb4-1a167038512b.content: {There is a distinction between function fulfillment and motivational states.}, {The theory of virtue as function fulfillment specifically addresses the aspect of rational activity related to functional excellence.}, {While intentions and motivations are related to achieving virtuous acts, the focus is on the quality of rational activity.}, {Motivations and intentions enhance functional performance but do not redefine virtue outside rational function.}

01b510a6-fbba-4d30-a622-e6edf2ced097.summary: Rejection of non-functional elements being central to virtue
01b510a6-fbba-4d30-a622-e6edf2ced097.content: {It is false that elements like intentions and character are essential components of virtue.}, {Virtue's core is grounded in the fulfillment of rational functions.}, {While intentions and character are beneficial, they arise from the excellence in performing rational activities and are not separate components.}, {Virtue remains fundamentally about the quality of rational activities.}

0a1e6e0b-b480-4aaf-bc7f-c310c230c950.content: {Virtue as function fulfillment incorporates a process of internal cultivation.}, {Internal cultivation involves aligning intentions and character with rational excellence.}, {The presence of motivations contributes to the process of developing rational activity but is part of achieving function excellence.}, {The theory allows for a dynamic interaction between functional achievement and internal cultivation to form a full account of virtue.}

2ad05f1a-3188-4909-a6eb-781994096051.summary: Virtue as Aligned Action and Harmony
2ad05f1a-3188-4909-a6eb-781994096051.content: {Virtue includes both inner harmony and corresponding ethical actions}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts}, {Virtuous action must align with ethical standards and reflect inner harmony}

13ccc93e-98e5-41aa-9fc0-e0a03ce25f66.summary: Virtue as Harmonious Intentions and Actions
13ccc93e-98e5-41aa-9fc0-e0a03ce25f66.content: {Virtue involves harmonious intentions and actions}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts}, {Harmonious intentions should guide ethical actions}

96c10711-ac97-4bee-bd15-f99b982347fa.content: {Virtue is characterized by consistency between inner harmony and ethical conduct}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts}, {Consistent ethical conduct reflects inner harmony}

b931b41d-de5f-4fd5-abfa-38ee380145b7.summary: Distinction between true inner harmony and false peace
b931b41d-de5f-4fd5-abfa-38ee380145b7.content: {There is a distinction between genuine inner harmony and a misguided sense of peace}, {Virtue as inner harmony requires that the rational part of the soul truly guides the soul’s actions}, {An unethical person at peace lacks true inner harmony because the rational part of their soul is not aligned with ethical principles}, {True inner harmony cannot coexist with blatantly unethical behavior}

a1661c30-a58a-4cf6-9295-0e45463da077.summary: Rejection of unethical inner harmony as true virtue
a1661c30-a58a-4cf6-9295-0e45463da077.content: {It is false that a person at peace while behaving unethically is truly virtuous}, {Virtue as inner harmony involves the alignment with ethical principles, which an unethical person lacks}, {A feeling of internal peace without ethical alignment does not constitute true virtue}

85287358-2c6b-43e7-82e5-22bbfe799e51.summary: Supplementary assumption: ethical conduct as a necessary condition of inner harmony
85287358-2c6b-43e7-82e5-22bbfe799e51.content: {Ethical conduct is a necessary condition for achieving true inner harmony}, {Inner harmony must include the ethical alignment of the rational part of the soul with behavior}, {Without ethical conduct, any sense of inner peace is merely superficial and not true harmony}

6ce55b0e-895d-4e5a-82df-5ad9fa4015a8.summary: Virtue as Alignment with Moral Truth
6ce55b0e-895d-4e5a-82df-5ad9fa4015a8.content: {Virtue is alignment with moral truth}, {Moral truth is independent of personal harmony}, {Inner harmony should align with moral truth to achieve virtue}

949f0d33-ae95-4bc2-9528-11fd75d9176d.summary: Virtue as Function of Rational Deliberation
949f0d33-ae95-4bc2-9528-11fd75d9176d.content: {Virtue is determined by rational deliberation}, {Rational deliberation aligns actions with moral principles}, {The rational part of the soul must align with objective moral principles}

9169c7e0-d1a1-4199-92f5-c64687ee516a.content: {Virtue is moral coherence}, {Moral coherence is the consistency of actions with moral norms}, {Inner harmony is virtuous when aligned with moral coherence}

dc417549-5e49-418f-8481-63dee5fa0301.content: {Virtue is commitment to objective moral goodness}, {Objective moral goodness transcends personal harmony}, {Inner harmony must reflect commitment to objective moral goodness}

5a934f1e-16c9-4844-8934-67503ea63295.summary: Virtue as Alignment with Ethical Intentions
5a934f1e-16c9-4844-8934-67503ea63295.content: {Virtue is alignment with ethical intentions}, {Ethical intentions guide moral actions}, {Inner harmony must support ethical intentions to achieve virtue}

4a1fa015-e95a-468f-bb05-e6c37697617f.content: {Virtue is adherence to ethical rationalism}, {Ethical rationalism involves reasoning according to moral truths}, {Rational part must align with ethical rationalism for virtue}

4bcaa1cc-e60f-4f46-88b6-25c4cc6e1e77.summary: Virtue as Alignment with Universal Moral Law
4bcaa1cc-e60f-4f46-88b6-25c4cc6e1e77.content: {Virtue is alignment with universal moral law}, {Universal moral law provides objective ethical guidance}, {Inner harmony is virtuous when aligned with universal moral law}

b6a867b0-7e32-4796-9631-bb820b0415b5.content: {Virtue is moral alignment}, {Moral alignment ensures the consistency of actions with ethical principles}, {Inner harmony must promote moral alignment to achieve virtue}

b48b0289-d106-4835-93b9-3ad4684612ba.summary: Virtue as Inner Harmony with Moral Virtues
b48b0289-d106-4835-93b9-3ad4684612ba.content: {Virtue is inner harmony with moral virtues}, {Moral virtues guide the alignment of desires, emotions, and reason}, {The rational part aligns desires with moral virtues}

6edef95f-fb1b-4a71-8f0c-51afb21223ee.summary: Distinguishing moral and non-moral inner harmony
6edef95f-fb1b-4a71-8f0c-51afb21223ee.content: {There is a distinction between moral and non-moral inner harmony}, {Virtue as inner harmony refers specifically to moral inner harmony where the rational part seeks moral ends}, {Inner harmony that results in immoral actions is a form of non-moral harmony}, {The intuition that immoral harmony can be virtuous is explained by failing to distinguish between these types of harmony}

7bcb6d37-9e1d-416d-92b2-757e702611be.summary: Rejection of complete inner harmony in immorality
7bcb6d37-9e1d-416d-92b2-757e702611be.content: {It is false that a dictator can achieve full inner harmony while being immoral}, {Inner harmony involves aligning the rational part with moral principles, which a dictator lacks}, {The alignment of desires and emotions with immoral rationale does not constitute true harmony and virtue}

c73e5e22-d2d2-4587-a84d-f1d715f8092b.summary: Supplementary assumption on moral content of rational governance
c73e5e22-d2d2-4587-a84d-f1d715f8092b.content: {Inner harmony assumes that the rational part inherently considers moral content}, {Without the moral content, the rational part's governance deviates from virtue}, {The appearance of harmony and virtue in immoral actions is due to lacking genuine moral guidance in rational governance}

44d737be-6bcf-4dc7-8e9c-5f7ae6638af3.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts accurately}

290396c2-4d94-4889-9205-8518cce27e43.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts with wisdom}

b1beaea9-caeb-42b8-adbb-d21ccf792af3.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts with knowledge}

79b1c193-8993-480c-a333-683bd4561225.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts with proper calculation}

d4430eda-35fc-4504-9400-50ee001476fa.summary: Virtue as Rational and Reflective Governance
d4430eda-35fc-4504-9400-50ee001476fa.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts with reflection and reason}

e778ab8b-c457-4c2f-b0ef-fc5ee506d6c8.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts while being aware of potential errors}

a986f72c-be68-4922-987e-e329b41b55bc.summary: Distinguishing between harmony and accurate calculation
a986f72c-be68-4922-987e-e329b41b55bc.content: {There is a distinction between inner harmony and the accuracy of rational calculations.}, {Virtue as inner harmony focuses on the alignment of the soul, not on the perfection of rational calculations.}, {A rational part governing inaccurately does not negate the alignment among parts, as long as the rational part maintains governance.}, {Inner harmony as virtue does not necessitate infallible rational decision-making.}

ce157407-9271-4511-8b75-febb3de223b8.summary: Full rejection of calculation error undermining virtue
ce157407-9271-4511-8b75-febb3de223b8.content: {It is mistaken to claim that errors in rational judgment undermine inner harmony.}, {Inner harmony centers on the hierarchical alignment, not on the accuracy of each judgment.}, {Errors in calculation do not signify a lack of virtue, provided the rational part continues to guide the soul.}, {Virtue as inner harmony is concerned with governance, not errorlessness in rational thought.}

f9eec370-dec1-4ec0-8504-c8a921dcb01d.summary: Supplementary assumption of educational and corrective practices
f9eec370-dec1-4ec0-8504-c8a921dcb01d.content: {Rational miscalculations are mitigated by educational and corrective practices.}, {Virtue as inner harmony assumes the potential for learning and self-correction.}, {Inner harmony allows for errors provided there is a process for improving rational understanding.}, {The governance of the rational part includes adaptability and learning from past errors.}

8924e1c6-a550-4206-8576-3fc72939a025.content: {Virtue is a dynamic equilibrium within the soul}, {Dynamic equilibrium involves the interaction and balance of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul facilitates mediation and integration among other parts}

4b508036-2acb-450c-99e6-a40d8b59787f.content: {Virtue emerges from constructive conflict}, {Constructive conflict involves purposeful tension among parts of the soul}, {Tension among parts of the soul is resolved through creative synthesis}

d051000a-10d7-4982-9a81-ef9df2197bc5.content: {Virtue is the result of harmonious growth of the soul}, {Harmonious growth involves stages of conflict and resolution}, {Each stage allows the rational part to integrate new insights into the soul}

107e03bb-256f-4f85-ae95-53e07f1a48e3.content: {Virtue is an adaptive form of inner harmony}, {Adaptive harmony requires flexibility among parts of the soul}, {Flexibility is maintained by the rational part directing adaptive responses}

78107738-b86d-4c8f-85f6-e1bfca17c62e.content: {Virtue involves dialectical growth of the soul}, {Dialectical growth occurs through opposing forces within the soul}, {The rational part synthesizes these forces into a coherent whole}

1dd75cf8-c4f8-4f64-8bdd-c843e6c8ba87.content: {Virtue results from the creative integration of soul parts}, {Creative integration involves diverse parts collaborating in novel ways}, {The rational part orchestrates innovative solutions from this collaboration}

420c3296-0482-4f85-94e4-98ede002ef43.content: {Virtue is the achievement of progressive unity of the soul}, {Progressive unity is achieved through successive cycles of conflict and peace}, {The rational part guides these cycles towards unity}

f4f0582d-9f56-485c-bed9-30df47c13442.summary: Distinguishing between creative and moral virtues
f4f0582d-9f56-485c-bed9-30df47c13442.content: {There is a distinction between creative virtues and moral virtues}, {Virtue as inner harmony is a theory primarily about moral virtues rather than creative virtues}, {Inner conflict may stimulate creative virtues without implying a lack of moral virtue}, {Inner turmoil in an artist can lead to profound art, but this does not necessarily make the turmoil itself virtuous in the moral sense}

11289f19-342d-4d7e-bcf5-420403fe6825.summary: Rejecting the intuition that inner conflict and inner harmony are mutually exclusive
11289f19-342d-4d7e-bcf5-420403fe6825.content: {It is mistaken to believe that inner conflict and inner harmony are mutually exclusive}, {Inner conflict can exist within a broader framework of inner harmony if resolved through rational governance}, {The process of resolving inner conflict can contribute to a greater sense of inner harmony overall}

6e884e9c-1ef5-4d33-baba-491eba51389a.summary: Supplementing with the concept of 'dynamic harmony'
6e884e9c-1ef5-4d33-baba-491eba51389a.content: {Inner harmony can be dynamic rather than static, allowing for growth through conflict resolution}, {Inner conflict can be part of a dynamic process that ultimately contributes to greater inner harmony}, {Virtue is achieved when inner conflict is resolved in a way that enhances the governing rational part}

02450aa7-8fc4-4359-9fc4-5b31490680a3.content: {Virtue is the resolution of desires through rational governance}, {Rational governance can facilitate the alignment of conflicting desires}, {The rational part's governance can reflect virtue without perfect harmony of desires}

2793a2ca-fa1c-4ded-8bb6-e8edb8685320.content: {Virtue involves revising desires to align with rational aims}, {Rational revision of desires indicates inner harmony}, {The governing rational part continuously revises desires to achieve virtue}

2fd5b0a6-80e3-436d-8fa0-07dc021ddfab.content: {Virtue consists of achieving intentional harmony between soul parts}, {Intentional harmony does not require the absence of conflicting desires}, {Rational intentions guide the harmony among the soul's parts}

98c3d001-b4a1-4ac0-8edd-f4c08d30413e.content: {Virtue is governed by the predominance of reason over desires}, {Reason mediates the resolution of conflicting desires}, {Dominance of reason is sufficient for the manifestation of virtue}

55101b59-5d6e-4f8e-a7dd-7f39f2ad4f53.content: {Virtue involves finding a practical equilibrium among desires}, {Equilibrium allows for rational governance amidst conflicting desires}, {Practical equilibrium reflects a form of inner harmony}

af9a700c-800e-4cda-9c36-10e833e5898c.content: {There is a distinction between inner harmony and mere resolution of desires}, {Virtue as inner harmony involves true alignment of soul’s parts, not just resolution}, {Rational governance means desires ultimately align rather than just resolve}, {Resolution of conflicts under rational governance does not equate to virtue without harmony}

b812e602-414c-47a3-8ab5-d8cacf65a216.summary: Rejecting the necessity of perfect harmony

122ad9d5-222c-4833-89f3-5f4c3cdc89fd.summary: Supplementing with a threshold concept of harmony
122ad9d5-222c-4833-89f3-5f4c3cdc89fd.content: {Inner harmony can be understood in terms of achieving a threshold level of harmony}, {A moderate alignment of conflicting desires may be sufficient for virtue}, {Rational governance creates an acceptable level of harmony reflecting virtue}, {Threshold harmony accommodates rational resolution as compatible with virtue}

8f89cc10-8268-4c43-ad95-96a47757648c.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts}, {External circumstances can influence the achievement of inner harmony}, {Virtue requires resilience to external disruptions}

a0795459-4b5a-4abd-8fcf-cab0c4a54c55.summary: Virtue as Inner and Outer Balance
a0795459-4b5a-4abd-8fcf-cab0c4a54c55.content: {Virtue is inner harmony and outer balance}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {Outer balance involves managing external circumstances}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts}, {Virtue includes the ability to maintain harmony under external pressures}

dca00de8-55af-4d44-a69d-5b3918e30401.content: {Virtue depends on inner harmony and external conditions}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {External conditions must facilitate inner harmony}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts}, {Virtue includes adaptability to external influences}

6548a688-c4ed-40d2-862f-29bdf0edeeac.content: {Virtue is harmonious adaptation}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts}, {Adaptation to external circumstances is integral to virtue}, {Virtue involves the integration of inner harmony and external adaptation}

d8889b6d-0faf-48ea-8bfc-feb9f295cd2b.summary: Distinguishing between internal virtue and external circumstances
d8889b6d-0faf-48ea-8bfc-feb9f295cd2b.content: {Virtue as inner harmony pertains solely to internal states of the soul.}, {External circumstances do not affect the internal alignment of the various parts of the soul.}, {Financial stress impacts the external environment, not the internal virtues.}, {Virtue is demonstrated by maintaining inner harmony even in unfavorable external circumstances.}

9435b38f-cce2-43b6-9448-ef17c506009b.summary: Rejection of external circumstances affecting virtue
9435b38f-cce2-43b6-9448-ef17c506009b.content: {It is false that external circumstances inherently disrupt inner harmony.}, {A person can preserve virtue by maintaining the rational governance of the soul despite external pressures.}, {Financial stress tests virtue but does not determine it.}

4cdc466d-5653-40de-afce-19ed728af558.content: {Inner harmony includes a form of resilience to withstand external disruptions.}, {Resilience as part of the rational governance ensures that external circumstances do not lead to inner disharmony.}, {Virtue involves the strength to maintain alignment of the soul under stress.}

09dcf9f9-025a-4ed1-94b6-c74e00e9e9ba.summary: Virtue as Inner Harmony with Moral Framework
09dcf9f9-025a-4ed1-94b6-c74e00e9e9ba.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts}, {Rational governance must align with a moral framework to ensure actions are virtuous}

e662296f-e9fe-4090-ae10-c1b40ce453eb.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts}, {Emotional insights must inform the rational part to align actions with moral virtue}

cd1c58bf-aa85-40b4-a1d6-c30b9adce655.summary: Virtue as Practical Wisdom-Guided Inner Harmony
cd1c58bf-aa85-40b4-a1d6-c30b9adce655.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts}, {Practical wisdom guides the rational part to ensure actions are virtuous}

483deab1-113d-419c-9a8e-96bee82eeba0.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts}, {Intuition is incorporated into rational decision-making to align actions with moral virtue}

5f3f8900-3f0e-4007-86e4-44c250f1ddf2.summary: Virtue as Comprehensive Normative Inner Harmony
5f3f8900-3f0e-4007-86e4-44c250f1ddf2.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts}, {Normative ethical principles inform the rational part to ensure virtuous actions}

a63d18d8-73bf-45e5-9a40-64262a661238.summary: Distinguishing between moral and strategic rationality
a63d18d8-73bf-45e5-9a40-64262a661238.content: {There is a distinction between moral rationality and strategic rationality.}, {Inner harmony requires moral rationality, not just strategic rationality.}, {A rational part of the soul aligned with moral rationality will lead to virtuous actions.}

a7e8314e-9736-42a3-bff9-05d8665081cd.summary: Rejecting the notion that non-virtuous rational actions define harmony
a7e8314e-9736-42a3-bff9-05d8665081cd.content: {It is mistaken to equate strategic rational actions with a lack of inner harmony.}, {Inner harmony entails that the rational part not only strategizes but also aligns with moral virtues.}, {Strategically rational actions that are not morally virtuous indicate a failure in moral rational governance.}

c8c5ee4f-0d59-4bb8-8f38-98c0dda1b2bd.summary: Supplementary assumption that virtue includes moral insight
c8c5ee4f-0d59-4bb8-8f38-98c0dda1b2bd.content: {An additional assumption is that true inner harmony involves moral insight.}, {Rational governance of the soul encompasses both strategic deliberation and moral insight.}, {With moral insight, strategically beneficial actions become aligned with virtue.}

e0aaa642-950e-4dda-9984-684c85ebc481.content: {Virtue is equilibrium among parts of the soul}, {Equilibrium is achieved when each part of the soul fulfills its natural function}, {The rational part of the soul guides without subjugating other parts}

9e687ea2-b433-4a30-83ea-b88529ad1258.summary: Virtue as Cooperation Among Soul Parts
9e687ea2-b433-4a30-83ea-b88529ad1258.content: {Virtue is cooperation among different parts of the soul}, {Cooperation entails mutual agreement and communication among parts}, {The rational part engages in dialogue with other parts to achieve consensus}

250d2cf7-4198-4d4b-9c01-84d14086caf9.content: {Virtue is the integration of various soul parts}, {Integration involves the harmonious synthesis of distinct functions}, {The rational part helps facilitate the integration without overpowering other parts}

d62454fd-42cd-4d53-8b9b-79862dfc3b37.content: {Virtue is the dynamic balance within the soul}, {Dynamic balance maintains continuous adjustment among soul parts}, {The rational part acts as a mediator for balance rather than a dominator}

5724c6dd-1c9a-45fa-a3f8-3ea2766eaeb2.content: {Virtue is collaborative governance of soul parts}, {Governance entails collective input and shared decision-making}, {The rational part coordinates collective decision-making without coercion}

5717aa00-3b2a-49f5-96f4-21966380d1fe.summary: Distinguishing between agreement and effective governance
5717aa00-3b2a-49f5-96f4-21966380d1fe.content: {There is a distinction between agreement and effective governance}, {Inner harmony as envisioned requires effective governance by the rational part rather than mere agreement}, {Subjugation of emotional parts to the rational part can be a form of effective governance}, {True virtue can be understood as a function of effective governance leading to overall harmony}

8ad96593-0fe3-4023-aec7-eb803386e888.content: {It is false that genuine agreement among parts is necessary for virtue}, {Virtue involves the rational part governing other parts, regardless of genuine agreement}, {The result of rational governance is inner harmony, which constitutes virtue without the need for universal agreement}

78512573-92ab-4737-b44d-43b5342ebf06.content: {Perceived agreement can result from harmonious governance}, {Rational governance can lead to a condition where other parts are aligned with rational decisions}, {This alignment creates a perception of agreement without requiring explicit consent from all parts}

edf98693-01d8-4949-8b81-c4d732810272.content: {Assume rational benevolence ensures decisions benefit all parts of the soul}, {This benevolence means subjugation leads to outcomes favorable to all parts}, {Thus, virtue and harmony do not require explicit agreement if rational governance is benevolent}

0f82e6d7-75d7-4992-b480-11c54d070f97.content: {Virtue is comprehensive inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of multiple parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts}, {Additional parts of the soul must harmonize}, {Virtue includes the alignment of all parts of a complex soul}

f20744a4-4534-444b-94cb-35f58b9aab4b.content: {Virtue is holistic harmony}, {Holistic harmony involves the comprehensive alignment of soul's parts}, {The rational part of the soul directs alignment}, {Every part of the soul contributes to virtue}, {Virtue is the cohesion of a complex, multifaceted soul}

5a71fa8b-4fec-4dc3-bcf2-e5fa43a08e51.summary: Distinction between essential and non-essential parts of the soul
5a71fa8b-4fec-4dc3-bcf2-e5fa43a08e51.content: {There is a distinction between essential and non-essential parts of the soul}, {Virtue as inner harmony concerns the alignment of essential parts of the soul}, {The objection assumes non-essential parts affect virtue, which the theory does not require}

c7198af4-51c3-43ec-8b96-416516abdfd4.summary: Rejecting additional complexity as relevant to virtue
c7198af4-51c3-43ec-8b96-416516abdfd4.content: {The assumption that the soul has more parts does not add relevance to the theory of virtue}, {Virtue concerns only the rational and governing relationships among recognized parts}, {Additional complexity in the soul does not impact the definition of virtue as harmony}

8842f2b0-aee1-4ddc-9cd9-8e72661e443f.summary: Assuming a supplementary notion of functional unity
8842f2b0-aee1-4ddc-9cd9-8e72661e443f.content: {Functional unity is a supplementary notion that supports virtue as inner harmony}, {This unity accommodates any number of parts by focusing on their coordinated function}, {Inner harmony remains central to virtue regardless of increased complexity in parts}

fbe4449c-67ff-4560-9be2-b24cef069a16.summary: Distinction between structural and functional components of the soul
fbe4449c-67ff-4560-9be2-b24cef069a16.content: {There is a distinction between structural and functional components of the soul}, {Virtue as inner harmony addresses functional relationships rather than mere structural complexity}, {The theory remains intact even with assumed additional structural complexity}

d2a90b93-0a98-4494-b6cb-34c20d9fdcb3.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must provide consistent guidance to other parts over time}

cb77fba3-ab3a-4977-8067-51b65e35c4c4.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must adaptively and consistently guide other parts to maintain harmony}

e9248469-308c-4649-85e5-5102e1ec3c8d.summary: Virtue as Rationality with Stable Principles
e9248469-308c-4649-85e5-5102e1ec3c8d.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul is governed by stable principles that guide other parts}

2003b292-df04-4bd8-adb3-8fe4c8f7b820.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must control other parts according to context without conflicting with the core principle}

cf310ecd-b3b5-4c5f-9f08-58fbd764806c.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul ensures equilibrium in governing other parts}

bf60eee9-7294-4116-a4b3-39048c85d6d8.summary: Distinguishing stable virtue from evolving rational governance
bf60eee9-7294-4116-a4b3-39048c85d6d8.content: {There is a distinction between the stability of virtue and the evolution of rational governance over time.}, {Virtue as inner harmony maintains that stable virtue is achieved when the rational part governs in accordance with true reason, even if specific rational dictates evolve.}, {The evolution of rational governance does not undermine the concept of virtue if it continues to align various parts of the soul in harmony.}

f1e386de-bab5-4675-b207-7b2a7fcdc7e7.summary: Rejecting the impact of evolving rational governance on virtue
f1e386de-bab5-4675-b207-7b2a7fcdc7e7.content: {It is false that changes in rational governance necessarily affect the stability of virtue.}, {Virtue is defined by the presence of order and alignment, which can be maintained despite changes in governance directives from the rational part.}, {Changes in rational governance reflect an adaptation that may enhance, not necessarily disrupt, inner harmony and therefore do not undermine the concept of stable virtue.}

bf40045f-a2e4-4475-9fff-64de048291cb.content: {Adaptive rational governance allows the rational part to respond to new circumstances without losing harmony.}, {Inner harmony involves not just the static application of reason but its dynamic ability to modulate governance.}, {Understanding virtue as linked to adaptive rational governance aligns the concept of virtue with inner harmony through evolutionary change.}

e4f92c23-3971-44e9-8445-4ca76d64d77b.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts}, {Inner harmony is an ideal state achievable through universal principles}

d5195181-d95a-4193-91f1-c184ba4a1be2.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the alignment of the soul that results in functional well-being}, {The rational part of the soul governs other parts by promoting functional outcomes}

6545da7f-d653-4fd5-9dc4-5007917a1c5e.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is individually defined alignment of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul must govern other parts in a manner consistent with individual uniqueness}

8226d133-62f3-48aa-98df-2ae7d879dedf.content: {Virtue is inner harmony}, {Inner harmony is the dynamic alignment of various parts of the soul}, {The rational part of the soul guides ongoing adjustments to govern other parts}

7fe03c7e-c62f-497a-a6b5-68767d0e1741.summary: Distinguishing between subjective and objective aspects of harmony
7fe03c7e-c62f-497a-a6b5-68767d0e1741.content: {There is a distinction between subjective and objective experiences of inner harmony}, {Virtue as inner harmony is concerned with the objective alignment of the soul’s parts rather than subjective experience}, {Cultural and personal differences affect the subjective experience but not the objective requirement of alignment}, {Universality of virtue is maintained through the objective standard of alignment of the soul}, {Subjective differences do not impact the universal criterion of rational governance}

9092e059-b89c-4181-9adb-71a3c574c45b.summary: Rejecting inner harmony variability as a challenge to virtue
9092e059-b89c-4181-9adb-71a3c574c45b.content: {It is false that variability in achieving inner harmony undermines virtue as a universal standard}, {Inner harmony is a functional concept requiring the rational part to govern, not a subjective feeling}, {Cultural and personal differences concern methodologies to achieve alignment, not the concept of virtue itself}, {Virtue remains a constant pursuit of rational order in the soul despite differing paths to achieve it}, {Inner harmony as virtue retains its universality even amid different subjective experiences}

a1caa52f-22df-49e7-9975-4ffd69a25fdb.content: {Virtue is understanding and applying moral truths}, {Moral truths are consistent with the well-being of others}, {Virtue requires application of moral truth in actions}

934e895f-d8ad-4cea-a703-8c00064542eb.content: {Virtue involves making decisions based on ethical reasoning}, {Ethical reasoning takes into account the impact on others}, {A virtuous person prioritizes ethically reasoned choices}

4549049f-a9e0-4fc1-a0d7-436af6489af6.content: {Virtue involves regulating emotions in accordance with moral values}, {Moral values promote human flourishing}, {Regulated emotions guide actions towards virtuous ends}

3fbc5b27-8dee-4a60-b53c-e1e9e661c7df.content: {Virtue is aligned with holistic well-being of oneself and others}, {Holistic well-being combines physical, mental, and social health}, {Virtuous actions enhance overall well-being}

61f945fe-f8eb-494a-b89f-79b13f39e681.content: {Virtue is the contribution to harmony within a community}, {Social harmony requires cooperation and mutual respect}, {Actions contributing to social harmony are virtuous}

12c010a5-5a51-4de3-9b91-d5482df11c49.content: {Virtue is the synthesis of rational thought and emotional understanding}, {Rational thought must be informed by compassionate emotions}, {Virtuous actions arise from this synthesis}

861dc521-71a2-4841-9c87-af61a35cb16c.content: {Virtue involves aligning actions with normative ethical standards}, {Normative ethical standards are derived from reason and empathy}, {Actions aligned with these standards are virtuous}

a998aedd-0961-4bc3-9b07-1edcfcc32b4c.content: {Virtue is adherence to a consistent moral framework}, {The moral framework is derived from principles of justice and care}, {Virtuous behavior is consistent with this framework}

17c4a764-e158-42e0-9db4-fa6b6d5d343f.content: {There is a distinction between alignment of the soul and the moral content of rational values}, {Virtue requires not only inner harmony but also that rational values are morally sound}, {Inner harmony alone does not guarantee virtuous action without correct rational values}
